name: Equinox Prime
description: Night and Day in final balance; the graceful perfection of the one that walks the borders.

abilities.name: Metamorphosis
abilities.description: Switch forms, temporarily gaining bonus Shields and Armor in Night-Form, or bonus Damage and Speed in Day-Form.

abilities.name: Rest & Rage
abilities.description: In Night-Form, targets are put to sleep. In Day-Form, targets become more vulnerable to damage.

abilities.name: Pacify & Provoke
abilities.description: In Night-Form, reduces damage inflicted by nearby enemies. In Day-Form, increases Ability Strength of nearby allies.

abilities.name: Mend & Maim
abilities.description: In Night-Form, allies' Shields are replenished with each nearby enemy killed. In Day-Form, enemies are inflicted with <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Slash Status Effect. Deactivate while in Night-Form to restore Health and Shields for Equinox and allies. Deactivate while in Day-Form to cast a wave of slashing force.

languages.description: Nacht und Tag endlich im Einklang; die anmutige Perfektion desjenigen, der auf den Grenzen schreitet.
languages.name: Equinox Prime

languages.description: Le Jour et la Nuit dans leur forme parfaitement équilibrée, la grâce parfaite de l'être parcourant les lisières.
languages.name: Equinox Prime

languages.description: Giorno e Notte in un definitivo bilanciamento; l'elegante perfezione di colei che cammina sui confini.
languages.name: Equinox Prime

languages.description: 낮과 밤의 조화. 경계를 걷는 자의 우아한 완벽함.
languages.name: 이쿼녹스 프라임

languages.description: Noche y día en un balance final; la gallarda perfección de aquel que camina en los límites.
languages.name: Equinox Prime

languages.description: 昼夜的最终平衡形态；行走于界线上的优美之型。
languages.name: Equinox Prime

languages.description: День и ночь в своём наилучшем балансе; грациозное совершенство того, что ходит по грани.
languages.name: Эквинокс Прайм

languages.description: 最後の調和を保った夜と昼。優雅な完璧さを保ち境界線を歩いてゆく。
languages.name: Equinox Prime

languages.description: Dzień i noc w swej finalnej formie; pełna wdzięku perfekcja krocząca na granicy.
languages.name: Equinox Prime

languages.description: O Dia e a Noite em harmonia absoluta. A plenitude honrosa para os que andam entre limites.
languages.name: Equinox Prime

languages.description: 晝夜的最終平衡形態；行走於界線上的優美之型。
languages.name: Equinox Prime

languages.description: ดุลยภาพแห่งกลางวันและกลางคืน; ความสมบูรณ์อันสง่างามของผู้ที่เดินข้ามพรมแดน
languages.name: Equinox Prime

languages.description: Gece ve Gündüz mutlak bir dengede; bu dengenin sınırında yürüyen mükemmel zariflik.
languages.name: Equinox Prime

languages.description: Утілення рівноваги дня й ночі, благородна бездоганність того, що ходить на межі.
languages.name: Еквінокс-прайм
